name: Dimeo's Jukebox
storyline: After a long and stormy night, Rob Dimeo wake up realizing that all the music from his collection was stolen! With some investigating, he found out that his records were trapped in jukeboxes scattered across the galaxy. The only way to retrieve them would be to search and wander through the portals stationed in the Alvar Museum. You must guide him, but beware of the challenges ahead. Only then will Dimeo be able to rescue his precious music!
summary:
Dimeo's Jukebox is a puzzle game and chiptune album released on a physical Game Boy cartridge. Featuring chiptune artist Rob Dimeo and featuring DIA. 
 
The game is a top down puzzle game where you must solve the puzzles to unlock the music and acts as a complimentary interaction. The music is however available if you prefer to just listen to it as an album.
